title: Healthy eating
description: Healthy eating promotes weight control, disease prevention, better digestion, immunity, mental clarity, and mood.

title: Regular exercise
description: Exercise improves fitness, aids weight control, bolsters immunity, and elevates mood, providing an overall sense of well-being.

title: Adequate sleep
description: Sleep enhances both mental clarity and physical health. It lowers stress, boosts mood, and boosts the immune system.

cards.title: gender
cards.description: The development and body fat composition of girls and boys vary with age. Consequently, a child's age and gender are considered when evaluating their BMI.

cards.title: age
cards.description: In aging individuals, increased body fat and muscle loss may cause BMI to underestimate body fat.

cards.title: muscle
cards.description: BMI may misclassify muscle builders as overweight or obese, as it doesn't differentiate between types of fat and muscle.

cards.title: pregnancy
cards.description: Expectant mothers experience weight gain due to the additional load of their growing child.

cards.title: race
cards.description: Certain health concerns may affect individuals of some Black and Asian origins at lower BMIs than others.
